      public Map<Scope,Boolean> validateScopes(String scope, List<io.jans.as.model.uma.persistence.UmaPermission> permissions, io.jans.as.common.model.registration.Client client)
      Parameters:
      scope - scope string from token request
      permissions - permissions
      Returns:
      map of loaded scope and boolean, true - if client requested scope and false if it is permission ticket scope
